Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory545.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: "...That's all for today. Any more questions, Captains and Commandants?", 4: '1'}

{3: 'The simulated sky outside has turned dark long ago, but the large meeting room is brightened up by ceiling lights. The meeting invite indicated it was a "short meet-up," but it lasted way longer than that unsurprisingly.'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'Any questions at all?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "Alright. The meeting's over then.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Even in the last row, you can feel Celica's uncontainable joy, probably because she does not have to work extra hours."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory17.jpg'}
{3: 'You follow the crowd outside and see the team members waiting.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Oh, it's Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The meeting must be exhausting, Commandant.', 4: '2'}
{2: "Where's Lee?"}
{3: "You hear Lee's voice from behind, along with—"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "I'm here too, Commandant!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'I had an annoying problem on the way here. It took me some time.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Are you talking about when you got lost in the square?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "You were going in the complete opposite direction if I didn't find you!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Thanks, Kamui.', 3: '33', 4: 'Are you here for Chrome?', 5: '35'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'No problem. I came here for you anyway, Commandant.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "I'm here for you, Commandant.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'What do you need our Commandant for?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Captain and Wanshi need to do some preparation, so I'm here to run errands.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Kamui hands over 4 red invitations. The address on them is a famous restaurant in Babylonia, while the time indicates 23:00.'}
{2: 'What is this?', 3: '44', 4: 'A gathering at this time? How did it get approved?', 5: '48'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "It's the invitation for our New Year gathering.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'The event last year seems to have had a great influence. Many are organizing such parties.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "So I proposed to host one if there aren't ongoing missions, and Captain agreed.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Today is the New Year's Eve in the Eastern calendar.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'The performance of WGAA last year had a great influence. Many are also organizing New Year parties this year.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Celica said there were too many applications, so President Hassen agreed to all.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'You could have told us in the comms. Why come all the way here?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "It's an important festival. We need some proper procedures!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Make sure you all come, Commandant. I still need to tell others!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Kamui left in a hurry. He seems to feel genuinely happy about the event.'}
{3: 'It is 20:22 now, still a long time away from the starting time of the party.'}
{3: 'As you try to think of something to do during this time, you notice a few unread mails on the terminal. They probably arrived during the meeting earlier.'}
{2: '(Open the mail)', 3: '65'}
{3: '"Commandant, you have a new gift!" The sender claims to be the 1st Department of Science Council, Babylonia.'}
{3: 'But from what you can remember, the 1st Department has never used such a random writing style. In fact, it really sounds like someone else...'}
{2: '(Open the next mail)', 3: '68'}
{3: '"The gift\'s been left unattended for a long time! Don\'t let it feel lonely! Open it now!" It comes from the same sender.'}
{3: 'You receive more mails every few minutes, most of them consist of the same messages that urge you to collect the gift outside the lounge.'}
{3: 'There is a lengthy gap after the second last mail. The last one was sent just minutes before the end of the meeting.'}
{2: '(Open the mail)', 3: '72'}
{3: 'It does not even have a sender.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Lucia notices you have been staring at the terminal. Unable to see the mail content, she is curious to know what happened.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "What's the matter, Commandant?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami seems to have sent something.', 3: '81'}
{2: "She's urging me to go collect it.", 3: '82'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Hope it's not explosives again.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Speaking of which, we haven't seen Nanami for a long time.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'You hear the sound of another incoming mail.'}
{3: '"Open it now before it gets mad!"'}
{3: 'There is no time to hesitate. You immediately run toward the Gray Raven lounge.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'I should have touched wood.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory17.jpg'}
{3: 'The lack of oxygen is making your brain all foggy. You feel your windpipe burning. Your lungs are demanding air with no limit.'}
{3: 'The countdown has stopped before you could realize. You blink a few times to barely calm down.'}
{3: 'In front of you is the familiar Gray Raven lounge. Fortunately, it is not in ruins as you imagined. You see a red package left at a very obvious place outside the lounge door.'}
{3: 'It seems the sender wanted to tie a complicated knot, but gave up half-way.'}
{3: "The package is entangled in rope. It doesn't look like the rope can be easily untied."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Is this Nanami's gift?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Commandant, did Nanami mention what was inside?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'At least the size of the package can rule out the possibility that Nanami wrapped herself inside.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Based on past experience, we better handle it with care.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Take it into the lounge first.', 3: '127'}
{3: 'When you lift the package up, you realize it is surprisingly heavy. Through the red wrapping paper, the gift feels like a hard, solid sphere.'}
{3: 'You cannot help but remember the bomb graffiti that Nanami did before, and become even more careful.'}
{3: "It's not like Nanami's gift can kill you or anything. But you still decide to treat it with utmost care because—"}
{2: "Hope the next door does not complain about us again. I don't want to write another incident report!"}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{3: 'The lounge door is closed. The package is safely placed on the table.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Shall I just open it?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Lee has a big frown on his face. You don't know whether he is troubled by the knot, or is thinking about how to safely open the gift."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "If it's a gift, why didn't Nanami give it to Commandant in person?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Maybe she wanted to give Commandant a surprise?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Perhaps she is just hiding nearby.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "It's from the package. Sounds like a tiger cub.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "No, Commandant. It's a tiger cub.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "It comes from Nanami's gift.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Did she send us a tiger cub?', 4: '1'}
{2: "The Star of Life's Quarantine Department would never let it pass.", 3: '161', 4: 'Since when did Babylonia offer this kind of delivery service?', 5: '165'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I agree. It can't be a creature inside.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "It's not a real tiger cub. The size is different.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Nanami won't put a living creature in the package. That would be too cruel.", 4: '3'}
{2: "Now that's a cat, isn't it?", 3: '174'}
{3: 'As you wonder why the thing inside can make different sounds, it has made new moves.'}

{3: 'It first starts to wiggle slightly on the table, but soon realizes something is limiting its movement. After a short pause, two lines of diamond-shaped black blades have pierced through the red paper.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Move back, Commandant!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Liv, protect Commandant!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'When the blades come out, Lee and Lucia immediately move in front of you as if something extremely dangerous is about to happen.'}
{3: "If they didn't leave their weapons in the prep room, they would have taken them out."}
{2: 'Do you really have to?', 3: '186', 4: 'Liv, get a containment tank!', 5: '190'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I'm not writing the incident report for you this time.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The thing inside has not stopped. As the black blades spin around, both the rope and the wrapping paper have been shredded.'}
{3: 'It appears to be a black, sphere-like object.'}
{3: 'It then shakes off the shredded paper, completely revealing itself.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'It is a machine that resembles the head of a tiger. The blades that cut through the rope earlier are its "ears."'}

{3: 'The anti-gravity system helps it to levitate and hover in the air, slowly spinning around. There is a red glow in its "eyes"—which are in fact cameras—suggesting that it could be looking for something.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Is this a CUB? Did Nanami make it?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'When you look into its eyes, the red glow quickly flashes and it quickly pounces at you like a tiger that has found its prey.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
